vlive.korean: 저도 무심코 여기 보고... I also looked up without even knowing. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.95
vlive.english: I also looked up without even knowing.

vlive.korean: 어? 지난번에 엄마랑 무심코 얘기해서 미안하다고요? Oh? "I'm sorry for saying with mom". 듣기 View video SF9 : 빈어스🍀
vlive.english: Oh? "I'm sorry for saying with mom".

vlive.korean: 무심코 나온 말인데... I just said it... 듣기 View video Glorious Entertainment : [이호원(hoya)]자?
[무심코 지나친 이 방...] [Passing by this room...] View video NCT : NCT LIFE 예능 수련회 EP 01
[무심코 미션 봉투를 내려놓는 두부] 난 성공했어. [Dahyun put the envelope down] I made it. 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV6 -TWICE in SINGAPORE- EP.02
vlive.english: [Dahyun put the envelope down] I made it.

examples.korean: He nodded absently, his attention absorbed by the screen. 발음듣기 그는 화면에 정신을 빼앗긴 채 무심코 고개를 끄덕였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He nodded absently, his attention absorbed by the screen. 발음

examples.korean: ‘Let the cat out of the bag’ is an idiom meaning to tell a secret by mistake. 발음듣기 let the cat out of the bag은 ‘무심코 비밀을 말해 버리다’는 뜻의 관용구이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Let the cat out of the bag’ is an idiom meaning to tell a secret by mistake. 발음

examples.korean: She let fall a further heavy hint. 발음듣기 그녀가 더 큰 암시를 무심코 흘렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She let fall a further heavy hint. 발음

examples.korean: I’m sorry, I wasn’t thinking. 발음듣기 미안, 내가 생각을 못 했어[아무 생각 없이 그랬어]. (무심코 남의 기분을 상하게 했을 때 하는 말) Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m sorry, I wasn’t thinking. 발음

examples.korean: We had inadvertently left without paying the bill. 발음듣기 우리가 무심코 계산을 하지 않고 떠났었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We had inadvertently left without paying the bill. 발음
